headline.main: Debt Reckoning: Updates on the Fiscal Deadline

docs.abstract: This feature follows the talks between President Obama and Congressional leaders over the so-called fiscal cliff. It aims to explain the major economic and fiscal issues, examine public opinion and analyze the options that the parties are considering as the deadline approaches.
docs.snippet: This feature follows the talks between President Obama and Congressional leaders over the so-called fiscal cliff. It aims to explain the major economic and fiscal issues, examine public opinion and analyze the options that the parties are considering...

docs.lead_paragraph: Corporations and business groups on both sides of the Atlantic are pushing for a pact, which they say would produce substantial economic benefits.

headline.seo: Trade Deal Between U.S.-Europe May Pick Up Steam
headline.main: Trade Deal Between U.S. and Europe May Come to the Forefront
headline.print_headline: Trade Deal Between U.S. and Europe Resurfaces

docs.abstract: Long-delayed free-trade agreement between the United States and Europe is gaining momentum among European leaders and business groups on both sides of the Atlantic;  pact could rival the North American Free Trade Agreement in scale, and could provide much-needed stimulus to the troubled Euro zone.
docs.snippet: Corporations and business groups on both sides of the Atlantic are pushing for a pact, which they say would produce substantial economic benefits.
